description:
Her encounter with Yuuno gives Nanoha magical powers, and she succeeds in sealing the mysterious shadow that threatens them. Later, Nanoha listens to Yuuno describe his world and his magic. Just as she decides to help him search for the “Jewel Seeds,” they feel the resonance of one in a shrine.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Mahou no Jumon wa Lyrical na no?
魔法の呪文はリリカルなの?
